mapper.select: SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS rownum, rs.shisetsuno AS shisetsuno, rs.customer AS customer, rs.sitecd AS sitecd, rs.jdgsw AS jdgsw, rs.endjdgsw AS endjdgsw, rs.status AS status, rs.starttime AS starttime FROM tbl_jikahorenrakusettei rs LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_site ts ON rs.sitecd = ts.sitecd;
